name: mobile
example_en: The mobile library visits our village every month.
example_cn: 流动图书馆每个月都会来我们村庄。
word_family: mobility (n. 移动性), mobilize (v. 动员), automobile (n. 汽车)
memory_tips: 词根 'mob-' 来自拉丁语 'mobilis'，意为 '可移动的'。联想记忆：想象一个移动的图书馆或移动的车辆，帮助记忆 'mobile' 的意思。图像记忆：画一辆移动的汽车或一个移动的图书馆。

image_prompt.main_image: A colorful mobile library van parked in a small village, with children eagerly picking books from the shelves.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of children sitting under a tree, reading books borrowed from the mobile library, with the van visible in the background.

collocations: mobile phone (手机); mobile app (移动应用); mobile workforce (流动劳动力)
